features: 【PH value close to baby's skin】 The PH value of alcohol free baby wipes is close to the pH value of baby's skin, which can effectively prevent and reduce allergic rashes, moisturize the skin and improve skin quality, so that the baby will no longer cry for rashes.

🌟【Clean, Nourish Further】with 4 in 1 natural plant extract including coconut oil, witch hazel extract, chamomile extract, and Vitamin E, these moisture baby wipes do not only clean well but also nourish and calm at each cleaning, to improve baby’s skin properties to prevent allergies or rash.

🧡【100% Degradable】Hypoallergenic baby wipes made of 100% plant fiber, these eco friendly wipes can be totally degraded to do no harm to the environment. These wet wipes approved by OE-TEX, REACH, and Biological Safety certification, we know we are definitely safe for babies and the earth.

🌟【100 Times Testing】Biodegradable baby wipes backed by 100 passing of 4 testing including PH balancing test, allergy test, soothing test, and toxin test, and also back by 600 parents’ approval. So no harm, no toxin, our natural baby wipes live up to be a loyal babies’ carer.

🎀【Thicker and More Textured】1 piece equals 2 pieces, our baby wipes newborn is made of 100% EcoCosy plant fiber which is 2X longer than cotton, along with innovative 3D pearl texture, all mess can hide nowhere from solid wiping.

🎗️【One Draw One Time】No stuck, no adhesion, our scented baby wipes adopt a special crossed lapping method to allow for smooth drawing even with one hand, a real new parents’ hack when nursing or holding the baby.

productInformation.value: 【Cloth-like Wipes】Babycozy wipes have an extra-large size, one piece tops 2, allowing you to solve the mess of changing diapers with the least amount of wipes, it is tough and not easy to break, and the fresh coconut scent makes diaper changing easy It is no longer a "painful" thing. manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Nourish and Protect Baby's Delicate Skin Enriched with 4 natural plant extracts to keep the baby's skin healthy. Coconut Oil-Rich in natural fats, to build up a barrier between baby's skin and irritants (and pee), is also an antioxidant and calms redness. Chamomile Extract-Nourishes and soothes baby's sensitive skin. Witch Hazel Extract-Rich in tannins to calm redness and irritation. Vitamin E-Softens dry, flaky skin and protects cells from damage.

Previous page Baby's skin is sensitive. It needs extra care. Coconut oil nourish wipes are enriched with four natural plant extracts to clean and nourish skin. Keep baby's sensitive skin healthy. A pH level of 5.8 makes it ideal to protect delicate skin from harmful substances. Make changing time as easy as possible. With the crossed overlapping technique, just grab one wipe at a time, the exact amount you want. Let one wipe do two wipes' job. The 100% EcoCosy plant fiber in our wipes makes them 2X thicker and sturdier than regular ones. Our most refreshing scent with coconut oil. Fresh coconut scent makes it easier for mom and dad to tackle not-so-pleasant messes (poop and pee)! Next page 1 2 in 1 Care 2 PH Balancing 3 1-Handed Dispensing 4 1 Equals 2 5 Refreshing Scent

Tips for using baby wipes It can be easily switched by pressing the opening of the baby wipes (as shown in the picture), and at the same time, the lid needs to be closed in time after use to avoid moisture evaporation. Attention to packaging Due to our printing errors, the wrong message on the packaging reminds you that "NOT for the skin around or on the mouth", the correct expression should be "can not be placed in the baby's mouth", we will correct it below One batch of product packaging.

See for yourself ! Our wipes are enriched with natural plant extracts, different from any other water-based wipes. They soothe and nourish sensitive skin just as well. Wash hands without "washing" hands. Brrr...washing hands in winter is cold, isn't it? Now you can clean up the mess with just one wipe. Best of all, the rich plant extracts in the wipe serve as great hand cream to nourish your skin. The wipes that moms will need, too. Use it anywhere (literally anywhere) on your body, whenever you need to freshen up. Hydrate and nourish while respecting your body's natural pH balance, just like the way it does for your baby. Baby wipes that truly work. BabyCozy coconut oil nourish wipes are made to exceed your expectations. They clean up messes, ward off rashes and nourish the skin like no other. Perfect for taking to outdoors. Finish off your outing prep list with a pack of these wipes. They wipe things clean easily and are soft and moisturizing, the perfect temp fix for when you forget hand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stays moist, does the job well
reviews.reviewText: The package is a nice size, and the coconut scent is light in my opinion which is good because I hate the smell of coconut. They are super moist and stay that way for a long time if you close the package properly. The wipes are super easy to get out. Will be my go-to wipes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Game-Changer for New Parents and Baby's Delicate Skin!
reviews.reviewText: As a first-time father, navigating the world of baby products led me to Baby Cozy wipes, and what a discovery it has been! First and foremost, the convenience of ordering through Amazon's subscription service ensures a seamless and timely supply, making my new dad life much easier.What sets these wipes apart is the superior quality driven by their thoughtfully chosen ingredients. It's clear that the makers understand the importance of gentle care for delicate baby skin. The wipes are not only effective but also free from harsh chemicals, providing a level of reassurance that every parent seeks.The impact on my baby's skin has been remarkable. No irritations, no redness – just soft, happy skin after each use. The wipes are generously moist without being overly wet, making diaper changes a breeze. The gentle formula is a game-changer for preventing any discomfort for my little one.I appreciate the attention to detail in every aspect, from the packaging to the texture of the wipes. They are sturdy, yet soft, and the mild fragrance is a subtle touch that adds to the overall pleasant experience.These wipes have become an essential part of my parenting toolkit. Their commitment to quality ingredients and baby-friendly design has won me over. As a first-time dad, I couldn't be happier with this find. I wholeheartedly recommend them to fellow parents looking for the best for their little ones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These were recommended by another momAnd wow what a difference! We struggled with diaper rash with our little one and when we switched to these all our problems practically stopped. So gentle on him and work perfect!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good product just doesn’t work for my sensitive little
reviews.reviewText: Great wipes, I like that they have texture to get a good quick clean for my wiggle worm but something in them gave my sensitive girl a little bit of a rash. I was set up for subscription but had to cancel. If they come out with a fragrance free version I would definitely try them again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This could be the "one"??
reviews.reviewText: Update (9/1/2023): It is still superior. When I had the fissure down there and it was a perfect way to test the wipes and I am so thrilled that it works perfectly. Other wipes: burn, difficult to wipe, pain...all the negatives reactions. Not so this one!!! Able to tolerate the pain with ease and the fissure healed fast. Wish that they make a bigger bulk for subscriptions, we will see!-----I'm a guy who use baby wipes and I have tried different brands without success until I discovered this brand. It works perfectly, I read some people who mentioned how it feels like lotion, oily....in negative way BUT not for me, it is exactly what I need. I prefer wet/lotion-y that provides "glide" feeling unlike "water" wipes. "Water" wipes are great for cleaning up hands, etc and definitely not for the hole. For years I used 7th Generation until they changed the wipe texture and formula- less "lotion" feeling and it causes burning/rash to my great disappointment. Other brands- thought I found the "one" and decided to keep it yet it does not have this "lotion"/glide feeling (Dudewipe). It does not cause burning or rash so that is a pro for this brand. The Babycozy- I tested it for weeks and no any negative symptoms and it provides great feeling. Babycozy- please keep the way it is!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Much better quality than others
reviews.reviewText: I use these on my baby and for myself to remove makeup. Yes they can be used on the baby face. They are truly the best wipes I have used and despite being expensive, when I went back to the cheaper wipes I immediately noticed the difference and started back on these again. You can’t go back to lower quality after these.What makes them great is that they’re not super wet but they have moisture every time, and you can use a lot less of them to get the job done. They are thicker than other brands. They come out of the package a few at a time but you cna shove the extra back in and they don’t dry out.I also trust these ingredients on my baby’s face more than other brands. Baby doesn’t have a diaper rash when I have to clean her extra times due to the glycerin and oil balance in these. They have no scent added, just a very mild scent from the ingredients.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Things are honestly the best, but I just wish they were not so expensive

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Baby Loves These
reviews.reviewText: I love these wipes. So soft and nice on babies skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice and large wipes which leaves the skin nice and clean great quality and quantity
Très bonne lingettesUn effet fraîcheur qu’on ne retrouve pas dans la concurrenceBonne tolérance DermatoJe recommande

Als Amazon Vine Mitglied habe ich die Möglichkeit ausgewählte Artikeln zu testen, wofür ich nicht bezahlt werde und in keinster Weise beeinflusst wurde.Die Bewertung erfolgt basierend auf Fakten und meiner persönlichen Meinung.Ich habe mich deshalb entschieden diesen Artikel zu bestellen.Ich habe schon einige Zeit Ausschau gehalten und war mir unschlüssig, da es eine Vielzahl an Anbietern gibt.Die Produkte, welche angeboten werden, unterscheiden sich optisch oftmals nur sehr wenig, sind aber bei der Verarbeitung extrem unterschiedlich.Nach einiger Recherche habe ich mich für die Bestellung entschieden und kann es beim besten Willen nicht bereuen.Der Händler ist super, die Preise sind fair und die Qualität stimmt.Der Karton kommt gut verpackt an. Es wurde nichts beschädigt und die Lieferung fand innerhalb weniger Tage nach Bestellung statt.Der Artikel ist wie beschrieben eingepackt, bestückt und überzeugt durch die gute Qualität und einwandfreie Verarbeitung.Preis- Leistung ist sehr gut!Ich kann es jedem nur ans Herz legen, der ebenfalls mit dem Gedanken spielt.

Ich verwende diese Feuchttücher wenn ich mit dem Auot unterwegs bin und mal schnell etwas zu Hände säubern benötige. Dafür sind sie wirklich sehr gut geeignet und dank des Verschlusses trocknen sie auch nach mehreren Wochen nicht aus. Der Geruch ist sehr angenehm und sie hinterlassen ein gutes Gefühl, nicht klebrig oder ähnliches. Alles in allem bin ich also vollkommen zufrieden mit dem Produkt und gebe ihm daher auch 5 von 5 Sternen!
Lingettes pour bébé de bonne composition. Le packaging permet aux lingettes de ne pas sécher. Laisse une légère odeur agréable.
